name: @suprdata/spec
description: Suprdata specification provided as types and json-schema

scripts.test: npm run lint; npm run test:run
scripts.build: rm -rf ./lib && npm run build:lib && git add ./lib && git add ./src/schemas.ts && git add ./schemas && git commit -m 'chore(release): build artifacts'
scripts.release: npm run build && npx standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --access public

author: Marco Bunge
